mapper.select:
select pj.fd_no , pj.fd_goals , pj.fd_title , nvl(pay.total_sum,0) , to_date(pj.fd_enddate,'yy-mm-dd') - to_date(sysdate, 'yy-mm-dd') remain_day , nvl(trunc(pay.total_sum / pj.fd_goals,2)*100,0) rate from funding_pj pj , (select fd_no , sum(pay_total) total_sum from funding_pay group by fd_no) pay where pj.fd_no = pay.fd_no(+) and pj.fd_satatus = '진행중' and pj.fd_startdate <= sysdate and pj.fd_enddate > sysdate
and pj.fd_category = #{fd_category}
and pj.fd_title like '%${search}%'
order by ${select} desc
order by pj.fd_no desc

select pj.fd_no , pj.fd_goals , pj.fd_title , pay.total_sum , pay.total_people , to_date(pj.fd_enddate,'yy-mm-dd') - to_date(sysdate, 'yy-mm-dd') remain_day , nvl(trunc(pay.total_sum / pj.fd_goals,2)*100,0) rate from funding_pj pj , (select fd_no , nvl(sum(pay_total),0) total_sum, count(user_no) total_people from funding_pay group by fd_no) pay where pj.fd_no = pay.fd_no(+) and pj.fd_no = #{fd_no}
